qrScanner.title: QR Code Scanner
qrScanner.subtitle: Scan visitor tickets for entry verification

instructions.position: Position the QR code within the scanning area
instructions.auto: The system will automatically detect and verify the ticket

scanSuccess.title: Scan Successful!
scanSuccess.subtitle: Ticket verified and ready for entry

scanError.title: Invalid QR Code
scanError.subtitle: The scanned code is not a valid ticket
scanError.errorMessage: This QR code does not contain valid ticket information or may be expired.
